description: The latest adventures of everyone's favorite dead hero continue! Deadman learns that crime lord Duroc's latest shipment of drugs contains an ingredient that will turn users into homicidal maniacs and the only way he can stop it is by becoming one of them!
name: Hate is a Drug

description: The latest adventures of everyone's favorite dead hero continue! At the bottom of the ocean, Deadman must wrest control of a nuclear submarine before it completes a mission of destruction! Â
name: Hidden Depths

description: A special 2-part tale, "Death and the Maiden," featuring guest-art by JosÃ© Luis GarcÃ­a-LÃ³pez & Eduardo Barretto! A police detective is on the trail of a serial killer and Deadman just can't resist lending a ghostly hand. But Boston Brand finds more than he bargained for when he meets the woman of his dreams, a woman targeted for death.
name: The Murderous Kind

description:
PLOT

Deadman wanders the streets during the chaos of Crisis on Infinite Earths, doing his part to save lives wherever he can. He is summoned by an unseen spirit who he assumes to be Rama Kushna (but is in actuality Hal Jordan acting as The Spectre) and told he is needed for a mission in the antimatter universe. Deadman is then

returned to where he was before.

The Flash appears and as he disappears, Deadman dives after him, finding himself appearing in the antimatter universe. Deadman watches as the Flash sacrifices himself, destroying the Anti-Monitor's machine. Deadman escorts the Flash's soul toward a bright light, which is being guarded by Darius Caldera, who captures the Flash's spirit in a bid for power.
name: The Quick And The Dead

description: PlotIn the midst of battle with Deadman, Darius Caldera disappears with the Flash's spirit. Hal Jordan as The Spectre sends Deadman on another mission. This time, Deadman witnesses the death of Robin aka Jason Todd. As Deadman is escorting Todd's spirit to the bright light, Todd's spirit is caputured by Darius Caldera.
name: Dead Loss

description:
Plot
Deadman is present for Superman's death at the hands of Doomsday. He escorts the man of steel to the bright light and Darius Caldera attempts to capture Superman's spiritin a soul cage. Deadman sacrifices himself and Caldera captures him instead.Â Â 
Â 
In one of Caldera's soul cages, Deadman learns that Caldera made a deal with the demon Neron to increase Caldera's power in return for capturing heroic souls for the demon. Caldera and Neron reveal their plan to Deadman. Caldera intends to inhabit the body of Superman, which will then be put to use by Neron.
name: Dead End!

description: The battle royale continues as Mongul teams up with the Cyborg Superman to kill Hal Jordan and destroy Coast City, unless Deadman can stop it. And if he does manage to save the life of Earth's Greatest Green Lantern...is that necessarily a good thing?
name: Deadlock!

description: The surprising conclusion finds Deadman discovering the shocking secret of who has been sending him on these missions to save the doomed heroes and why, but he may not like the answer.
name: Deadline

description: The Libertania, an experimental utopian ocean-going community. A mega-liner with a population of 100,000, its own government and its own army. A floating city of tomorrow for people who want to escape the rat race of dry land life. What happens when the Libertania declares war on the world? And what happens when Ned Slade and the officers of The Hand arrive on the scene too late to prevent the President of the USA from being given 34DD breast implants? Â
name: Zero Democracy

description: As the madness of Spartacus Hughes runs rampant on the gargantuan city-ship Libertania, can the officers of the Hand persuade amnesiac agent Ned Slade to save the day when he's just been arrested on suspicion of child murder? And can Tony the cat withstand another attempt on his life? All this and more as the plot thickens! Â
name: [Heart]*%$ Police

description: This is it, all the answers you've been waiting for are here! What is The Hand? Who are Man Green/Man Yellow? Where is The Crack? The Dark Secrets of planet Earth unfold for Ned Slade as he begins his final initiation as a garbage man and faces the ultimate revelation of life, death, identity, and the Beyond.
name: Inside the Hand

description: Following last issue's revelations, it's time to meet Mother Dirt and learn the secret origins of the Hand organization and of life on Earth itself. What are we? Who are we? And why does it have to be this way? Amnesiac Hand officer Ned Slade recovers more horrors from his memory as the pieces of a vast, terrifying jigsaw fall into place. Learn the Hidden History of Existence in THE FILTH #10: "Man Made God." Â
name: Man Made God

description: He's had enough and he's not going to take anymore! At the brink of oblivion, timid Greg Feely fights back. It's Greg vs. Greg! Greg vs. the neighbors! Greg vs. Dmitri-9! Who lives? Who dies? Find out in THE FILTH #11: "A Very English Nervous Breakdown." Â
name: A Very English Nervous Breakdown

description: The penultimate issue of the 13-issue miniseries! Following last issue's revelations, it's time to meet Mother Dirt and learn the secret origins of the Hand organization and of Life on Earth itself. What are we? Who are we? Why did it have to be his way? Amnesiac Hand officer Ned Slade recovers more horrors from his memory as the pieces of a vast, terrifying jigsaw fall into place. Learn the Hidden History of Existence in THE FILTH #12 - "Schizotype." Â
name: Schizotype

description: The ground-breaking miniseries concludes with apocalyptic revelations galore. It's the end of the line for Ned Slade as the Hand organization crumbles around him and the final truth is revealed. Get ready to meet Mother Dirt and learn who really runs things on Planet Earth. Â
name: Them Vs Us

description: Sam Kieth returns with a brand-new HOMAGE COMICS miniseries: FOUR WOMEN, the story of four friends bound together by a dark secret and a terrifying revelation. FOUR WOMEN is a story about strength, the will to survive, and the endurance of friendship. Â

Overview

The startling new Homage mini-series continues. Some secrets are revealed in the second episode of Sam Kieth's story. Bev, Donna, Marion and Cindy are stuck in the car on the way to the wedding. Or at least, that's as far as Donna's gotten with her therapist. She's finding it difficult to just spill out the details of the trip. And when the revelations come, you won't know who's more surprised; Donna, reliving the experience, the therapist, hearing the details for the first time, or you.

Though her therapist doesn't quite understand why, Donna can't admit her true feelings. She's still angry with Bev for being right. She hates herself for not helping Marion, but can't bring herself to do it. But she finally sees a chance to help Cindy and she takes it. Could it be that the bad guys pay for what they've done? Even those things they've never quite gotten to do? Â

Tommy, Tiegel, Catwoman and others are trapped in a church under attack by a Mafia goon squad. The Mawzir, who can't actually shoot at consecrated ground, is off slaughtering responding cops. The only hope for anyone inside is Etrigan, deep in the depths of hell, to fetch the Ace of Winchesters, a gun that could kill any demon. But first, Etrigan has to conquer hell itself!
name: Ace of Killers, Part Three

description:
While Etrigan and Baytor battle the Arkannone for the Ace of Winchesters, Tommy, Catwoman, Natt and Tiegel are at the mercy of the Mawzir. But help arrives in the form of...Section Eight? "Ace of Killers," part 4.

Six-Pac tries to rescue his friends by gathering the 'old band', a group of somewhat super-powered lunatics.
name: Ace of Killers, Part Four

description:
Tommy and his friends are making a stand inside a church, with the Mawzir, a demon, eager for their deaths. And the only thing keeping this six-armed gun-demon from joining is that the building is still standing and thus concescrated.

And then the building explodes.
name: Ace Of Killers, Part Five

description: British SAS soldiers, some of the best-trained men in all the world, come looking for Tommy and Natt. During the latter's Middle East military service, a horrible accident had occured and they tried to sweep it under the rug. Now it's time to pay the price.
name: Who Dares Wins, Part 2

description:
Of Thee I Sing Superman and Tommy discuss the nature of hope and salvation, after Superman is tested by the expectations of a man he is unable to save. A truly fantastic issue, that outlines the differences of Superman and Tommy through their unique moralistic worldviews and their actions as discrete heroes of the DC universe.

Superman, mistaking Tommy for a casual fan, gets to talking. Superman is suffering a deep depression, he had failed and seen an innocent man die in front of him.

Notes:

  • Ranked #46 in Wizard Magazine's list of "100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born".
name: Of Thee I Sing

concept_credits.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

first_appearance_concepts.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

description:
Unimaginable secrets of rival assassin Ringo Chen are revealed in "For Tomorrow" part 1! One of the first to come to light is that Ringo just happens to be dating Wendy, Tommy's girlfriend from the first year of the series. And the tension and danger only intensify from there!

Simply because they are so skilled with guns, tensions rise between Tommy and his friend Ringo Chen.
name: For Tomorrow, Part One of Four

description:
The tension between Tommy and Ringo escalates, becoming apparent even to the crew at Noonan's. Tommy pays a visit to Wendy to try and defuse the situation--but trouble breaks when Ringo shows up and sees them together! "For Tomorrow" part 2.

Tommy is caught up in a revenge hit on one of his friends, Ringo Chen.
name: For Tomorrow, Part Two of Four

description:
The torture continues for Tommy and Ringo as the Waterman puts the duo through the most horrendous moments of their lives! Plus, even more secrets are revealed about Ringo's past in China and how he made his way to America. "For Tomorrow" part 3.

In between being tortured by Waterman for the benefit of a client, Tommy learns of Ringo's past life, including time spent in the Chinese military.
name: For Tomorrow, Part Three of Four

description:
In "For Tomorrow" part 4, Tommy and Ringo make their final stand against the electric freak known as the Waterman...and at least one participant is not walking away!

Tommy takes down everyone responsible for Ringo's death.
name: For Tomorrow, Part Four of Four

description:
After the events of the last arc, Tommy goes to Wendy's and falls into some old habits and makes a decision that he will definitely regret--especially when Teigel finds out about it!

Tommy tries to get his life back together; he and Natt take on the job of killing a pedophile.
name: The Morning After, The Night Before

description:
Old enemies combine to turn the Cauldron into the most dangerous place on Earth for Tommy, as the full horror of Agent Truman's experiments come to light. "Closing Time" part 3.

Tommy's holed up with his last few allies as they try to protect a dear friend from a government hit squad. His on-again, off-again girlfriend Tiegel has a nasty argument with him and splits for the last time.
name: Closing Time: 3

description:
The origin of Tommy Monaghan! A special issue focusing on the early years of everyone's favorite Hitman, as we see his early friendship with Pat and the years he was raised by Sean. This leads to the fateful night of horror that brought him down the path to being a hired killer. "Closing Time" part 4.

Tommy's war against a super-hero-obsessed CIA man continues. His goal; protect a dear friend from assassination.
name: Closing Time: 4

description:
The origin tale of Tommy Monaghan continues! This issue flashes back to Tommy's days as a United States Marine and when he first hooked up with Natt! "Closing Time" part 5.

A flashback to Tommy's army days, where a simple plan to bust up a scam turns quite horrible.
name: Closing Time: 5

description:
Marc Navarone, the son of the late Johnny Navarone, prepares for his final confrontation with Tommy! Plus, Natt and McAllister learn the meaning of trust, as they do their best to locate Tommy and add firepower to his side. "Closing Time" part 6.

A last-ditch plan of Noonan's to protect Tommy from beyond the grave could instead end in horrible death and destruction. His only hope, a woman he's not quite sure he can trust.
name: Closing Time: 6

description: Deep within the bowels of the underground center that houses Truman's Bloodlines project, Tommy, Natt and McAllister go up against CIA guards bent on protecting the secrecy of the horrific experiments at all costs.
name: Closing Time: 7

description:
Be there for the end in "Closing Time" part 8! The extra-sized finale has Tommy and Natt facing off against Truman and his men. Bullets fly, people die, and last call rings out for HITMAN!

The final storyline issue of Garth Ennis' Hitman.

Tommy and Natt try their best to escort their innocent pregnant friend to safety. It doesn't exactly work well. An FBI ally does take the woman to a safehouse but Tommy and Natt end up shot to pieces on a Gotham empty lot. Mr. Truman falls dead in the crossfire. As the two heroes lay dying they both experience a vision of Noonan's bar where all the beer is free, guns are not allowed and all their deceased friends are waiting.
name: Closing time: 8

description: Tim Hunter returns! Older. Wiser. More powerful. But still without all the answers. HUNTER begins an all-new ongoing series where Tim's adventures bring him to realms both familiar, Gemworld and Skartaris, and unknown, aided by his owl familiar Yo-Yo. Â
name: The Lake of Fire, Part One: The Lake of Tears

description: Kalesh, the girl from Gemworld Tim rescued in the first issue, enters the White School, her education anything but smooth. As they grow closer, Tim starts to get involved in the war on her homeworld. But in taking on Kalesh's problems, is Tim just running away from his own?
name: The Lake of Fire, Part Two: The House of Leaves

description:
Helena's father is alive?! And how is he connected to Omerta? Omerta the Silencer's identity is revealed in this thrilling issue!

The Huntress is tricked into believing that her father Franco Bertinelli is still alive. She also finds out who Omerta the Silencer is. This leads to her being captured/playing possum to find out why her father was targeted and why he was dismembered. There is also a side story about Tony Angelo's involvement in in the Huntress' life and how long he has been a part of it. This does not go well for their relationship but there is hope for a reconciliation.
name: Everything Changes!

description:
The Huntress finds out the secret of the family fortune and goes face-to-face with her father's murderer.

The conclusion of the origin

This book is the final conclusion of who was behind the murder of Huntress's family and why. Huntress pretends to be helpless as her would-be captures take her on a path to the answers she had been looking for since issue one of this series. He father had a secret safe and only Huntress can open it when she does it unlocks all the secrets and gives Huntress all the answers...or did it?
name: The silence is broken

description:
With her father's death avenged, the Huntress' mission is finally overâ¦but new troubles are brewing as a secret diary makes her the target of the world's most notorious serial killer.

Jessica Sharp is a reporter who has her face burned by acid for speaking out against the mob. The Huntress intervenes but too late to keep her from getting burned. Huntress then gives a copy of half of her father's ( Franco Bertinelli's) ledger to a police detective that she trusts to translate it. Unable to find someone to translate it he enlists the help of the Bookworm to help him solve the the code but the Bookworm has other ideas.
name: Where the Bodies Are Buried

description:
Who is the Huntress' partner? Learn how he gained his prowess in the martial arts and weaponry and what led him to become a family bodyguardâ¦and what Helena means to him.

Bookworm's Rampage

The Bookworm is free from prison and starts his murderous rampage to catch the Helena Bertinelli. Unknown to him Helena is the Huntress. He is also armed with her father's Franco Bertinelli's ledger with incriminating information that could put the whole city of New York under his heel.
name: A Bad Seed

description:
The Huntress puts her life on the line when she goes up against a gang of drug dealers who have taken over a neighborhood. And Helena is the target of a serial killer who has access to the Huntress' secrets.

Huntress tries to save Gina Manelli who writes a let all book about being her father's mistress. This gets the attention of the Bookworm who wants her dead for it. Meanwhile a little boy named James Cooper to make a nuclear bomb.
name: Solitary Confinement

description:
Nightmares come true as drug dealers begin building their own nuclear weapon and the Huntress is victimized by a serial killer.

A gang forces a young boy, James Cooper to make a nuclear bomb and makes sure his family stays out of the way. Meanwhile the Huntress tries to save a woman from the Bookworm and the Bookworm keeps getting the better of the Huntress. Lastly, a detective that the Huntress trusts is grilled by the New York City Police over his relationship with the Huntress.
name: Child's Play

description:
It's a showdown between Wyvern and the Huntress, while the countdown continues for Manhattan, courtesy of nuclear terrorists.

Huntress has her final stand with Bookworm with a little help from Tony Angelo, but Tony looses his nerve and Huntress has to deal with Picture Man getting away. Meanwhile the funeral of Melina Cooper and her youngest son happens.
name: Mad Scientists

description:
Terrorists hold the city hostage with a nuclear bombâ¦only the Huntress's skill and determination stand between salvation and devastation.

La Bruja tells Huntress where James Cooper is and that he is being forced to make a nuclear bomb. Huntress and Tony Angelo go to save the boy form the Psycho Crew in a new bullet proof van that Tony had made.
name: Party At Ground Zero

description: The Huntress saves a young girl who was pushed off a building after being assaulted and it gets her to deal with her own trauma as a child growing up in a home of organized crime.
name: The Talking Cure

description:
A new hero has appeared to stop the rise of violence in New Yorkâ¦if only he can stay out of the clutches of the mob boss he seeks to destroy.

Huntress continues to get therapy but is upset that no one is willing to step op to these criminals. The Huntress should be careful what she asks for because she in none to happy when the Waterfront Warrior shows up. Meanwhile the Brick Wall moves in on Tony the Gut territory and has the reality television host Mike Cobb set up a race riot on his show live. This is all to lower the property value of the area so Brick Wall can buy up the business in the area and set up condos.
name: Networking

description: As Nathaniel Kent and Joshua Freeman continue their search for Mary Glendowen, they reencounter Wild Bill Hickock. Meanwhile, Jeb Kent joins up with Jesse James and his gang following the end of the Civil War.
name: To The Stars By Hard Ways Part 1

story_arc_credits.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

description:
"To the Stars by Hard Ways, Part 2." Jebediah learns he is a father to the son of Lily Beaumont. Mary sees how poorly the U.S. government can treat Indians.

The issue opens with Jeb Kent and the James-Younger gang trying to sell stolen gold for greenbacks in Texas. That's where Jeb runs into Lily Beaumont and his son Taylor for the first time. Meanwhile, Nate Kent and Joshua Freeman visit Nate's other brother Joel William Kent who's a soldier in the U.S. Army, and has found Joshua's father, Tobias, serving in a negro unit.

Reunions aside, hard days lay ahead for everyone...
name: To The Stars By Hard Ways Part 2

story_arc_credits.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

description:
Jonathan Kent continues to collect the letters he found buried on the farm. This batch all date from 1869.

Scalphunter finds Mary Glenowen and convinces her that Nate Kent still loves her. She agrees to send word to him that she wants to reunite.

Jeb Kent continues to pull bank jobs with the James-Younger Gang.

And, Nate Kent takes a job as a Deputy Sheriff of Hays City Kansas, under Wild Bill.
name: To The Stars By Hard Ways Part 3

story_arc_credits.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

description:
"To the Stars by Hard Ways, Finale." In this final issue, Jebediah tries to save Nathaniel. Will he get to redeem himself?

Joshua Freeman comes to Smallville to ask Nate Kent to help him track down John Wesley Hardin, his father's murderer.

Jeb finds his son and joins him in the Taylor-Sutton feud.
name: To the Stars By Hard Ways Finale

story_arc_credits.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: To the Stars by Hard Ways

description: Deep under the Colorado Rockies J'onn J'onzz discovers an ancient enemy of his people, the only natural predator of the Martian race, the B'ool Sporath, the Bloodworms of Mars! Now he must do what no Martian has ever done, defeat these relentless killers...alone!
name: Blood Worms of Mars!

description: The Hidden life of J'onn J'onzz. How did he become a Manhunter? What is the connection between Mars and Apokolips? What are the roots of his enmity with his brother, Malefic? Secrets are revealed and mysteries explained as we go back to J'onn's earliest life and days on Mars. Â
name: In My Life, Part One

description: Presenting a tale from the days when Mars still pulsed with life, before J'onn J'onzz came to Earth. Darkseid has conceived of the Anti-Life Equation and has attacked Mars seeking its solution. Now J'onn, alone and friendless, comes to Apokolips to return the Martian captives and keep Darkseid from his goal. Once there, he'll find treachery, alliances, and something more! Â
name: In My Life, Part Two

description:
From J'onn's life on Mars comes the story of his first confrontation with his brother, Malefic. The hunt brings J'onn to Venus as he learns the terrible price of being a Manhunter.

Note - Despite being on the cover, Etrigan does not actually appear in this issue.
name: In My Life, Part Three: Earthfall

description: Final Issue. The return of the Justice Experience's greatest nemesis, Dr. Trapps, may mean the end to the Martian Manhunter, as J'onn is forced to make a decision that will affect the rest of his (possibly very short!) life.
name: In My Life, Conclusion: Traps
The Creature From the Black Bog!
Diablo -- The Demon From the Fifth Dimension!

description:
Finally, Elektra and the Architect collide, but all is not as it seems. The Architect passes himself off on stage as Clytemnestra! Myth and reality merge as Elektra confronts the man who seeks death at her hand.

The Architect wants Elektra to kill him so he can enter a new mortal body. Elektra and Doctor Strange hatch a plan to trap the Architect forever.
name: Child of Darkness

description:
When Elektra is paid to keep the police's star witness from the clutches of a fearsome quartet known as the Four Winds, she quickly begins to wonder if the job and the witness is worth the money!

Elektra battles the martial arts group, the Four Winds, while an unexpected visitor begins a clandestine surveillance on Elektra.
name: Four Strong Winds

description:
Elektra's first brush with Daredevil! Can this explosive couple leave past wounds behind them, as they track a new, dangerous vigilante?

After an intimate encounter with McKinley Stewart, Elektra returns to her apartment, where she gets a visit from Logan. Later, as Logan leaves, Stewart arrives and mistakes their friendship for something more, and after a barely averted scuffle, both men leave.

The next morning, Nina McCabe and 'Konnie' Weiss discuss the latter's predicament (being a male reborn in a woman's body). Konnie gets a makeover, care of Nina.

That night, Elektra threatens a slumlord to get out of town, a job for which she's paid under-the-table by the cop, Morrisey.

Meanwhile, Konnie has a strange dinner date with Elektra's partner King Lau.

The next morning, on the streets, Stewart tells Elektra a blind man is "looking" at her; in a way, he is: Matt Murdock thinks he senses her.
name: Flowers & Flamethrowers

description: Elektra foils a bank robbery only to find her ex-lover Matt Murdock also one the scene; The American Samurai makes a mysterious first appearance, and Elektra and Daredevil decide to join forces to find and capture him.
name: The Good, The Bad, and The Somewhat Confused

description:
Daredevil and Elektra stand united against the American Samurai, unaware of the dangers that the mastermind has laid out for the former couple.

Daredevil and Elektra continue the pursuit of the American Samurai, posing as bank robbers to draw him into a trap. He escapes and sets a trap of his own for the wayward lovers.
name: Love & Death in New York

description:
Elektra and Matt are on their way to reconciliation, when an old samurai begging for an honor killing places the couple at a moral impasse.

The American Samurai launches a one man assault on Sing Sing penitentiary to punish criminals.

Daredevil and Elektra aim to stop him, but a decision by Elektra drives a wedge in between their relationship.
name: Seppuku

description:
Elektra suffers a personal loss at the hands of Kuroyama. Wolverine provides back-up in the assassin's revenge mission against The Hand.

Elektra confronts the Kuroyama in her burning New York apartment as he threatens her friend, Nina. Kuroyama incapacitates Elektra, who can only watch as the assassin kills Nina.

At Nina's funeral, Elektra is accosted by her friend's family who blame her for the death. That night, distraught and directionless, she informs her lover Mackinlay Stewart that she's leaving for a time, then seeks out Stick for advice.

The next night, having contacted Wolverine, the pair invade the lair of the Hand, leaving a trail dispatched ninjas who dissolve into smoke. They find Kuroyama, and the fight ensues. As they battle, the ninja taunts Elektra that what her heart seeks can be found only "between Mercy and Wrath". She runs him through with her sword.

As she questions Kuroyama's parting words, Wolverine explains Mercy and Wrath are two mountains in Japan, between which lies a valley housing a stronghold of the Hand. Elektra knows now where she must go.
name: A Hand Raised Against Her

description:
Shang-Chi and the Kingpin feature in Elektra's bid to build a new life!

Elektra's hunt for Nina's killers bring her into a loose partnership with Shang Chi. They battle a group of Si-Fan Ninjas before getting the truth from Kingpin. Elektra returns to New York to find Nina, but significantly different.
name: And Ne'er The Twain Shall Meet

description:
Nina, now under The Hand's control, attempts to take out her former friend. Will Elektra convince Nina to join her in Kuroyama's undoing?

Nina returns, under the Hand's control to fight Elektra, while members of the Hand (including Kuroyama) watch. Elektra convinces Nina that she does not belong with the Hand and the two join forces to battle Kuroyama.
name: The Circle Unbroken!

description: A new chapter of ELEKTRA excitement continues as new writer Greg Rucka (TANGLED WEB: SEVERANCE PACKAGE, Detective Comics) takes Marvel's deadly assassin back to her roots, and into new peril! Elektra's loyalties are tested to the limit when a mysterious Greek heiress's true goals become clear! How far will the beautiful assassin-for-hire go to fulfill an assignment? Find out in the conclusion to "Hubris"!

Elektra is a ruthless, efficient assassin, but what happens when she's between jobs, with no one to kill? Greg Rucka and Chuck Austen reveal a chilling, self-destructive side to Marvel's sexiest assassin in this unforgettable story!
name: Unemployment

description: The wait is finally over! Dreamwave presents the triumphant return of The Transformers! Long thought dead by the inhabitants of Earth, we discover that the classic metal warriors of Generation 1 are far from gone. But where have they been for so long, and why only now have they chosen to return? And who is the mysterious man called Lazarus and what is his plan? Issue #1 promises all of the intrigue, action and excitement Transformers fans have waited so long to see! Transformers: Generation 1 #1 is the first issue of a 6-issue mini-series that marks their victorious return to comic books. The fun and mayhem begin here. Don't miss out!
name: Prime Directive; Part 1

description: The triumphant return of the Transformers to the world of comic books continues with this, the second of the six-issue mini- series. The mysterious man known only as Lazarus continues to extend his secret project ?? and to dangerous ends. Is there anyone... anything that can help challenge this new global threat? Indeed there is... and his name is Optimus Prime! But first he'll need to find a few old friends to help him on his way. Only, can he find them in time?
name: Prime Directive; Part 2

description: Dreamwave's resurrection of the Transformers continues! Optimus Prime is back, but so is his arch-nemesis Megatron. Reunited with his Decepticon followers, Megatron begins an evil scheme that, if successful, will leave Earth and all humanity in ruins. What is this sinister plan and are the Autobots even strong enough to begin to fight it? Also, Spike is drawn into a mystery he's not sure he wants to solve... who knows where it will lead him! Issue #3 of the six-issue mini-series continues the action-packed adventures of your favorite Generation One Transformer characters! Comes with a mini-poster!
name: Prime Directive; Part 3

description:
The Incredible Hulk (seen as the Savage Hulk persona) wanders aimlessly through the countryside following his infamous battle with the Abomination. He looks to be suffering some sort of melancholy and thinks of finding a place of acceptance. His wanderings find him in the town of Wausau, Wisconsin. Meanwhile, Nadine and Simon are driving in a decrepit van, searching for a place to begin anew. They end up in Wausau as well. Simon is also known as the Killer Shrike, a super villain with the power to shoot flames from his wrists (with the assistance of wristbands).

The Killer Shrike robs a store and exits to find the Hulk in the street. He attacks the Hulk, who wants no part of the fight. During the battle, the Killer Shrike blasts a building to make it collapse on the Hulk. The Hulk emerges from the rubble unscathed and swats the Killer Shrike away from him, then leaps away. The building falls on Simon's van, killing Nadine. The Hulk ponders those he has loved and lost before entering a restless sleep.
name: Do You Know Where You're Going?

description: It's great to be Bruce Banner! You have a wonderful wife, two loving children, a great job and the respect of the community. So why do you keep seeing a nightmarish, green creature in the mirror? The devil is calling for his due, Bruce, but do you have the coinage it'll take to cross the river Styx?
name: Past Perfect

description: Has Bruce Banner's worst nightmare become reality? You've waited to see what his release would mean to the jade giant! Now the Devil Hulk, the sum total of all of the evil and malice in Banner's soul, makes his move to dominate The Hulk's future! But how does his plan involve giving Bruce everything he desires?Â
name: Once in a Lifetime

description: Bruce Banner, Angela and Doc Samson have woven a tangled emotional web around each other. And when a sinister entity starts twisting that web, tugging on the various strands of love, hate, pain and desire, The Hulk finds himself at the mercy of the one foe he cannot vanquish: his own rage!
name: Animus

description: Hiding in plain sight in a roadside convenience store, the fugitive Dr. Bruce Banner finds himself caught abruptly between a gun-wielding madman, a constricting circle of local police, and dark, predatory forces with motives of their own -- in a contest of straining wills that demands only one grim resolve: The Hulk must become both savior and unbridled demon!
name: Boiling Point

description: Bruce is trapped in a dangerous hostage situation in Miser, Colorado. His only chance of escape Agent Pratt of the FBI, but Bruce rather stay inside with the crazy gunman where it's safer.
name: Poker Face

description: The X-Men are in Valencia, Spain, where they all get attacked by the local guardia forces. Rogue is shot into the sea, while Storm, Bishop, Beast, Psylocke and Thunderbird are caught; only Sage manages to escape. The Deputy Minister of Justice arrives at the high tech base of the guardia where she is met by the commanding officer. He tells her about the testing and dagnostics they are performing on the X-Men team. Meanwhile Vargas and his henchmen kill some local police who are hoping of capturing Rogue when she washes ashore. The rest of the team wake up to find themselves in a maze and after a short battle fall through a hole in the floor.
name: Now, It Begins

description:
The captured X-Men deal with everything that the Civil Guardia throws at them in their examining Maze, but they get separated. Rogue and Sage locate the base, and Rogue forcefully enters the ancient towers, only to find the scientists killed. She is then attacked by Vargas, who defeats her. Beast and Psylocke come to the scene, and again Vargas easily beats Hank, breaking many of his bones; only Psylocke is left standing. In the following battle Vargas kills her by running his sword though her gut. Vargas claims that she was only the first and leaves to let the rest of the team find their beaten comrades and PRONTO is written with Betsyâs blood.

Last Comics Code Authority approved issue.
name: Blindside

description: Following their battle with Vargas, Psylocke is really dead and Beast mortally wounded. The rest of the team searches the city all over, but canât find the killer, who is neither mutant, nor superbeing, yet something more than human. To save the Beast from dying Tessa uses a never before seen power. She can perceive mutants' full potential and temporarily bring it forth. It strains her a lot, but she boost Hank McCoyâs healing factor so that he is able to survive his injuries. Later Psylockeâs coffin is brought to the airport to be flown to England. Storm also sends the Beast back to Westchester as he is too weak and would only be a liability. Unbeknownst to them, Vargas is watching them.
name: Hell To Pay
